newsitem.title: USA: Samsonite stake cut by Cooperman group.
newsitem.headline: Samsonite stake cut by Cooperman group.

text.p: A group led by New York investor Leon Cooperman said Friday it cut its stake in Samsonite Corp to 1,008,412 common shares, or five percent, from 5.1 percent previously held.

In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said its latest transactions include a net 18,300 common shares sold between April 22 and May 22 at prices ranging from $45.89 to $46.25 per share.
The luggage company is based in Denver.
